thread.section_title: Home Zone Furniture Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Home Zone Furniture | homezonefurniture.com
thread.title: Krystal
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Krystal

author: Krystal
title: Krystal
text: Heath and the manager helped us so much we will be telling all our friends and family to go see them. They went out of their way calling all the stores to see if the couch me and my husband wanted was in their back rooms. They finally found it and have made customers out of us for life. Thanks again Heath!!
